title: Issues syncing with Ropsten
body:
### Description
Issues seen while attempting to sync a node with Ropsten
- initial pivot block extremely old
- peer repeatedly sending bad blocks

### Acceptance Criteria
* A node can successfully sync with Ropsten testnet

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. Start a sync with Ropsten

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]
Succesful sync

**Actual behavior:** [What actually happens]
Failure to confirm pivot block and failure to sync

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]
Currently happening consistently locally

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: [`besu --version`] besu-1.5.1-SNAPSHOT

### Additional Information
